item.name: Hostname
item.description: Coleta Informação do hostname do dispositivo

trigger_prototype.expression:
(({SinalBR - Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].change()}<={$ATTENUATIONFACTOR}) or ({SinalBR - Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].change()}<={$ATTENUATIONFACTOR}) or ({SinalBR - Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].change()}<={$ATTENUATIONFACTOR}) or ({SinalBR - Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].change()}<={$ATTENUATIONFACTOR}))
and
(({SinalBR - Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane0[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}<>-40) or ({SinalBR - Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane1[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}<>-40) or ({SinalBR - Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane2[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}<>-40) or ({SinalBR - Huawei:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPowerMLLane3[{#ENTPHYSICALNAME}].last()}<>-40))
trigger_prototype.name: Signal Atenuation on Optical Module ML: {#ENTPHYSICALNAME}
